subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Re: Unicode proposal again.
msgSnippet: ... Just for the record, Michael is severely dyscalculic and innumerate: he can add on his fingers and that s about it (okay, I exaggerate slightly, but not
messageBody:
amd64_hacker scripsit:

> For example, the words 'I' and 'eye' should have the same digest and
> therefore a distance of 0.

Just for the record, Michael is severely dyscalculic and innumerate: he
can add on his fingers and that's about it (okay, I exaggerate slightly,
but not much). So don't expect him to understand string distances.

> Soundex is antiquated and never really worked anyway,

It actually works fairly well for the intended domain of use: proper names.

--
And through this revolting graveyard of the universe the muffled, maddening
beating of drums, and thin, monotonous whine of blasphemous flutes from
inconceivable, unlighted chambers beyond Time; the detestable pounding
and piping whereunto dance slowly, awkwardly, and absurdly the gigantic
tenebrous ultimate gods -- the blind, voiceless, mindless gargoyles whose soul
is Nyarlathotep. (Lovecraft) John Cowan|cowan@...|ccil.org/~cowan
